text: Yngvar Hafsund Karlsen (4 June 1920 - 28 July 2001) was a Norwegian speed skater, born in Eidanger. He competed at the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo, in 5,000 and 10,000 m. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Porsgrunn Category:Norwegian male speed skaters Category:Olympic speed skaters of Norway Category:Speed skaters at the 1952 Winter Olympics
title: Yngvar Karlsen
